Name: Degen Royale
About the game: Philly welcomes you to Degen Royale. You and your fellow companions are chosen from the world's best and brightest to compete against one another on the tropical Degen Island. As you beam onto the Island you will be equiped with the most wacky guns and gadgets immaginable to compete in an exciting free-for-all deatchmatch called 'Rumbles'. Only one elite player can win in this third-person shooter that up to 100 online players can join. Unlimited ammo, unlimited respawns, unlimited fun together. Pick your character Participate in the Island Rumbles with an Ape avatar. Wacky weapon Become the number one survivor using your Banana Blaster to shoot other players. Free-for-All Rumbles Up too 100 online players can participate in an free-for-all deathmatch third-person shooter on the island.
